body_content.explanation: a tropical plant that produces a large fruit, the outside of which becomes hard when dried and can be used as a container:
examples: Bottle gourds are spectacular plants with their oddly shaped fruit.
Bottle gourd, amaranth and pumpkin were the three most common species, being cultivated on more than 70% of the land.

body_content.explanation: a large fruit, the outside of which becomes hard when dried and can be used as a container, that grows on a tropical plant:
examples: Bottle gourds dangled from a latticed trellis like oversized pears.
Add chopped chilli to the grated mixture of carrot and bottle gourd.
